questions.question_text:
A marketer sent a promotional email to contacts who recently attended a trade show. The data extension used for the send contained 3,100 records. The delivery rate on the send was lower than anticipated. After viewing tracking information, she determined many email addresses were problematic.
Which send tracking metric provides the bounce description `Address is non-existent at the domain`?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Hard Bounce: https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000387252&type=1

Selected Answer: AD
A and D

Selected Answer: AD
Shouldn't it be A and D instead of A and B? Creating folders do a better job at segregating in comparison to naming conventions

choices.B: Optimize the way content is stored with a naming convention.
choices.A: Plan for content to be used cross-channel, eliminating duplicates.
choices.C: Import all content up front, rather than piece by piece.
choices.D: Create folders for each type of uploaded content.

questions.question_text: Which two best practices should the customer follow to ensure marketers across the company are taking full advantage of Content Builder? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Clearly mentioned in sendlog best practices document - "You can also use a query activity to move data from an active send log to an archive data extension, as necessary."

Selected Answer: A
Correct answer is A
SQL Query activities in Automation Studio allow marketers to select and transfer data from one Data Extension to another automatically.
Since the customer needs to move Send Log data older than 10 days into an archive Data Extension, an SQL Query can be used to filter records and insert them into the archive Data Extension on a scheduled basis.
It's A. "You can also use a query activity to move data from an active send log to an archive data extension, as necessary."

Selected Answer: C
Use case: Birthday Email campaign

You have a Data Extension of Contacts with a ‘birthday’ attribute. You want to send an email to those contacts with a birthday in that month.

You can achieve this by creating a Filter Activity that includes a Data Filter where the Contact’s birthday is in the current month. An Automation Studio job would be set to run monthly.

Selected Answer: A
You can also use a query activity to move data from an active send log to an archive data extension, as necessary.

questions.question_text:
A customer has a Send Log they are using to track the email addresses that were sent to, date and time of the send, and the name of the email sent for reporting purposes. Per best practice, the customer stores 10 days of data in their Send Log and then archives the data into another data extension that holds data for one year.
Which activity should be used to run the backup automatically?

discussion.content:
C
• Based on <list or data extension> - The test email renders personalization based on the entire list or data extension selected in the Subscriber Preview step. For example, if your list contains 20 subscribers then 20 personalized email versions will be sent to each recipient.
• Based on <recipient test data extension> - The test email sends to each subscriber in the selected recipient test data extension. The email renders based on the recipient's data.

Selected Answer: C
C is the correct answer.
In Salesforce, the correct wording is 'Based on Subscriber Preview 'DE name''.
We can then enter upto 5 email addresses to which we can then send multiple emails based on the chosen DE for proofs.

Selected Answer: A
In this instant it should be 'A' since the scenario in question is asking about ways to send to the inbox of the QA specialist. By using the Test DE with the data variation needed to send out the email (assuming each record has the QA specialist email) they will be able to test and review all the possible personalization/variation in one go.

However, if we go with 'C' you will need to 'test send' each personalization/variation one at a time, which may not be the most efficient way to go about it.

choices.D: Create a Test data extension that contains the five content variations the two team members need to validate.
choices.B: Enter the email addresses to receive proofs, and then select the specific records from a list or data extension whose rendering should be sent.
choices.C: Enter the email addresses to receive proofs, and then choose to send ג€Based on Subscriber Preview 'myTestData.'ג€
choices.A: Choose data extension of contacts, and then choose to send ג€Based on Recipient Test Data Extension.ג€

questions.question_text:
While testing an email with dynamic content in Content Builder, proofs of five content variations need to be reviewed directly in the inbox of a marketer's quality assurance specialist and the marketing manager. A data extension named 'myTestData' contains only the variations needed.
Which method should be used?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
Authenticate email sending to distinguish it from spammers.
Purge old or inactive email addresses.
Encourage subscribers to add the company’s sending domain to their address books.

Selected Answer: BCE
Authenticate email sending to distinguish it from spammers.
Purge old or inactive email addresses.
Encourage subscribers to add the company’s sending domain to their address books.

questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) has been sending email for about 10 years. A new marketing manager noticed NTO's deliverability continually decreased over the last year. NTO wants to grow its existing subscriber base and increase its ROI on email marketing by improving engagement with its subscribers.
Which three strategies will help improve NTO's email deliverability? (Choose three.)

choices.E: Encourage subscribers to add the company's sending domain to their address books.
choices.A: Purchase lists from companies that guarantee users have opted in.
choices.D: Ensure the spam complaint rate is between 1% and 3%.
choices.B: Authenticate email sending to distinguish it from spammers.
choices.C: Purge old or inactive email addresses.
